# Data Cleaning

```{r cleaning}
allbus2006 <- read_dta(here::here("data", "ZA4500_v2-0-0.dta")) # gesis data

allbus2006 |> 
  mutate(
    v736 = ifelse(v736 %in% c(8:10), NA, v736))
```
